pages.description: Ricochet landing was developed for Motiv Studio for a digital data analyses project called Ricochet.

pageContent.info: Ricochet landing is landing page I built for a startup app that helps businesses track important metrics. The site is full of animation and interactions that keep potential users engaged while learning about the application.

showcaseTwo.heading: My Role
showcaseTwo.text: For this project I was tasked with developing the enterity of the frontend experience. I designed and built out the architecture of the website from scratch, planning accordingly for the neccessary features to make this project shine: responsivness, unique animation, and it's variouse interactions.
